name: Everyone Goes Home
detailed_description:
The story of Everyone Goes Home follows a demon & god who are floating through eternity while taking care of their respective business. The demon offers a break from their eternal boredom in the form of a bet over a board game. The god puts up 8 souls as the wager, and these souls are also the game pieces of the board game. The player must now help the 8 characters complete the trial within the selected time limit.

- Play as 8 characters!

- Compete for the best time on the leaderboard!

- Psychedelic art style through out the game!

- Puzzle solving & platforming, get ready for a challenge!
